scripts.build:windows: npm run build:project-root --workspace=soundboard-client && npm run build-server:windows --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest-builder:windows --workspace=soundboard-listener && xcopy /e/h/y/q "packages/soundboard-listener/media" "./dist/media\" > nul 2>&1
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:project-root --workspace=soundboard-client && npm run build-server:mac --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest-builder:mac --workspace=soundboard-listener && cp -R ./packages/soundboard-listener/media ./dist
scripts.build:linux: npm run build:project-root --workspace=soundboard-client && npm run build-server:linux --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest --workspace=soundboard-listener && npm run build-manifest-builder:linux --workspace=soundboard-listener && cp -R ./packages/soundboard-listener/media ./dist
